channel.title: Gauntlet League Wrestling (August Weds)
channel.description:
![glw%20pic|500x500](upload://tMF0erNZW0bkqz4ED1Lr5r2CqId.jpeg) **WRESTLE ALL THE THINGS! CONQUER ALL THE ARENAS! SEIZE THE GAUNTLET!**
Gauntlet League Wrestling! There's new management in Gauntlet City. Who will take up the mantle? Will it be a Bleakwood? someone from the Kraken's stable? The secretive Sirius Bizness? or a new challenger?
We will be putting on eight sessions of *World Wide Wrestling* -- four in August and four in September! Come in at any time, play whichever sessions you want, try it out! Most playbooks will be available (Core, *International Inciden* t, Season 1 & 2). We’ll start each session building a quick heat map for the wrestlers and then get ready to rumble. No experience necessary, rules will be taught in a friendly environment.
If you’ve been curious about *World Wide Wrestling* , come in and try it out. It’s fun and furious for any and all. Your Creative’s a relative newb to Pro-Wrestling so we’ll all advance together. Sessions run up to 3 hours. We’ll be using a couple of optional rules from WWW: *International Incident* to start: The Hunt Protocol (take stat advances from other playbooks) and Promotion Tags. We may add Audiences and Mythic Moments later, depending on how it goes. For more on *World Wide Wrestling* , see http://ndpdesign.com/wwwrpg/
Move lists and playbooks will be posted ahead of time. If your attendance or RSVP changes, please also send me a message at edige23 at gmail. IF YOU SIGN UP, PLEASE ADD THIS TO YOUR CALENDAR. LET’S GET IT ON!!!
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) safety tool will be in use.
[date=2019-08-07 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-07 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1]( https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhlE7JUo5Rwv_ZT1kY1)
[date=2019-08-14 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-14 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2]( https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhlFV-2bTP59jggMWkh)
[date=2019-08-21 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-21 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3]( https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhlGOfh9MIhB1TCV0g7)
[date=2019-08-28 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-28 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4]( https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LhlGoAJa-zoL2lDQg9q)

@edige23 wrote:

glw%20pic1272×1272 327 KB

WRESTLE ALL THE THINGS! CONQUER ALL THE ARENAS! SEIZE THE GAUNTLET!

Gauntlet League Wrestling! There’s new management in Gauntlet City. Who will take up the mantle? Will it be a Bleakwood? someone from the Kraken’s stable? The secretive Sirius Bizness? or a new challenger?

We will be putting on eight sessions of World Wide Wrestling – four in August and four in September! Come in at any time, play whichever sessions you want, try it out! Most playbooks will be available (Core, International Inciden t, Season 1 & 2). We’ll start each session building a quick heat map for the wrestlers and then get ready to rumble. No experience necessary, rules will be taught in a friendly environment.

If you’ve been curious about World Wide Wrestling , come in and try it out. It’s fun and furious for any and all. Your Creative’s a relative newb to Pro-Wrestling so we’ll all advance together. Sessions run up to 3 hours. We’ll be using a couple of optional rules from WWW: International Incident to start: The Hunt Protocol (take stat advances from other playbooks) and Promotion Tags. We may add Audiences and Mythic Moments later, depending on how it goes. For more on World Wide Wrestling , see http://ndpdesign.com/wwwrpg/

Move lists and playbooks will be posted ahead of time. If your attendance or RSVP changes, please also send me a message at edige23 at gmail. IF YOU SIGN UP, PLEASE ADD THIS TO YOUR CALENDAR. LET’S GET IT ON!!!

The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy will be in play and the X-Card safety tool will be in use.
